Title: Relates to the eligibility of enrolled members of Southampton Village Ocean Rescue for the tax exemption on real property authorized by section 466-c of the real property tax law
Summary: Provides that enrolled members of Southampton Village Ocean Rescue shall be eligible for the tax exemption on real property authorized by section 466-c of the real property tax law.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to the eligibility of enrolled members of Southampton Village Ocean Rescue for the tax exemption on real property authorized by section 466-c of the real property tax law
